title: Cinderella Carrot
brief_description: If Russell Crowe was played by a carrot in Cinderella Man you’d have Cinderella Carrot, a triumphant story of carrot vs hamburger. Jim Stalk, a retired boxer from Jersey returns to his home town to save his family from poverty by going up against the mighty Deadly Dan, a hamburger with a body count in the boxing ring.
